newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IBP Inc started at hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IBP Inc started at hold.

text.p: -- Stephens Inc said it initiated coverage of IBP Inc with a hold recommendation until operating conditions and earnings visibly improve.

-- Stephens said IBP, the nation's largest processor of beef and pork, lacks strategic positioning to capitalize on structural changes in the pork industry, where difficult operating conditions for pork packing continue.
-- Additionally, near-term improvements for beef packing are being overshadowed by longer-term prospects for cattle herd liquidation and declining processing efficiencies, Stephens said.
-- IBP shares were trading up 1/8 Wednesday at 23-1/4.
